QuestData.Title: Welcome to Zuldazar
QuestData.Description: Champion of de Horde, welcome to de city of Zuldazar, capital of de Zandalari Empire, de jewel of all troll civilizations.$b$bI would have you ride by my side so we might discuss matters without prying ears close at hand.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with General Jakra'zet in the Grand Bazaar.
QuestData.RewardText: Dat is far enough, Horde scum.
